item.title: Signals all out, 27th November
item.description:
UKPN attended site with TFL engineers and found multiple blown fuses, have been advised to pass to borough to investigate.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Becontree Avenue, Becontree, Greater London

item.title: Noisy drain again, 27th November
item.description:
With every passing car the drain makes a loud clang audible within houses and causes a nuisance. This was only fixed 1 year ago and has had repeated issues over the years. Needs fixing asap please

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Logs Hill, Elmstead, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The southbound lights at Liverpool Rd junction are not clear enough from a distance, 27th November
item.description:
`1 - can't see them when there are buses/lorries in front of them. We need a higher set . 2 - It's not clear enough, when they are on Red, that the left one is for Straight on and the right one is to Turn Right. Drivers just see Red lights and don't know which is which. This is the A1 so main road into City of London and there are lots of unfamiliar drivers on this route. The signs should be made clearer so that people can see which direction a red light relates to and get into the correct lane. There is a lot of red light jumping here because people are in the wrong lane. Also hooting and moving across late as people realise (once lights have changed to green) that they are in wrong lane.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 229, Holloway Road, Highbury, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bed and Mattress Dumped on Pavement, 27th November
item.description:
Parts of a bed and a mattress have been dumped on the pavement outside 348 Plumstead High Street, close to the junction of Plumstead High Street and Wickham Lane. These items have been there since Monday 24/11/25.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Plumstead High Street, Plumstead
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tip - paint, varnish etc pots, 27th November
item.description:
Paint, varnish etc pots dumped on the pavement on both sides of Church Manor Way road; outside the Allotments perimeter fence (these pots are damaged & substances have leaked onto the pavement) & outside St Paul’s Academy perimeter fence. They have been there for over a week.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Church Manorway, Abbey Wood
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dog Fouling in Children Play Area, 27th November
item.description:
Neighbours and businesses have complained about a young adult male walking their dog and allowing them to use the play area/basketball court, as a toilet. All reports have identified the male as coming from either 1-37 Hassett Road or 13-49 Hassett Road

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Barnabas Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole getting worse quickly A1 Northbound Holloway Rd at lights w Junction Rd, 27th November
item.description:
Large pothole quickly getting worse in A1. Vehicles swerving to avoid it. Pothole at very top of Holloway Rd, in the Northbound carriageway, in the pedestrian crossing just before force right turn towards Archway Road. This is a major ambulance and lorry route - needs fixing please. Pothole appears to have a manhole cover under it but it is unclear.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 693, Holloway Road, Archway, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Deep pothole in road in front of 82 Drayton Park, 27th November
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 82, Drayton Park, Highbury, Greater London

item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tavistock Square, St Pancras, Greater London
